Title: A Resolution Independent Video Language
Body: They are: Graph restructuring: Combining or reordering nodes in the graph for speed Result-region calculation: Computing only the parts of an image that affect the output Direct transfer detection: Copying compressed data directly to the output when possible Image subgraph reuse: Sharing common subexpressions in the image graph Image caching: Caching images if they are needed later in the graph evaluation Image subdivision: Dividing large images into manageable pieces <-- The Rivl Interpreter <-- Table of Contents 4.
